snippet: Lawand Tinsley, 19, was charged with attempted murder, assault and possession of a weapon in a shooting in the Brownsville neighborhood on Sunday.
abstract: New York City police announce the arrest of Lawand Tinsley, a suspect in a shooting in Brooklyn that left six people injured, including a 2-year-old girl; shooting was the latest in a series in which bystanders, including young children, have been caught in cross-fire.
lead_paragraph: Lawand Tinsley, 19, was charged with attempted murder, assault and possession of a weapon in a shooting in the Brownsville neighborhood on Sunday.

headline.seo: Man Arrested in Brooklyn Shooting That Injured Six
headline.main: Man Arrested in Brooklyn Shooting That Injured 6
headline.print_headline: Man Arrested in Brooklyn Shooting That Injured 6
